messages.subject: RE: when they won't talk
messages.msgSnippet: Mary, I ll throw something at you just because you asked for help. You can completely disregard it if it sounds rediculous to you. I don t know Sierra, other
messages.messageBody:
Mary, I'll throw something at you just because you asked for help.
You can completely disregard it if it sounds rediculous to you. I
don't know Sierra, other than the little I've read, but she sounds so
much like my son I just had to let you know. We went through very
similar baffling episodes before he was finally diagnosed with
Aspergers Syndrome. He's so mildly affected, it was not easy to pick
up, but now that I know about it, I can understand him so well now
and life is peaceful again. Just a thought. Hopefully, it's just a
phase for her. Best of luck. Beth
